Reviews.Content: arrived executive hotel pacific late sunday night helped front desk efficiently kindly booked online received free ipod gift card offered 1 bag upstairs refused questioned front desk agent 30 minutes terms surrounding assignment patiently willingly answered request quiet fulfilled topmost floors corner breathtaking view bay city am eternally grateful furnished cleanly elegantly retro bathroom quality bathroom products chic accents throughout lit huge desk comfy chair flat screen tv king bed gigantic extremely comfortable call front desk questions hotel blocks link rail system train goes airport downtown seattle quick walk 5 minutes steps harbor 5 minutes aquarium stuff beautiful location safe especially night hotel guard front seattles coffee shop downstairs connected lobby book online super discount buy 3 nights 4th free deal roughly 100 night superior king free computer lounge free wifi super convenient fridges hotel fridge downtown seattle doesnt pay power altogether stay exceptional absolutely complaints service phenomenal hotel staff world nice single person interacted genuine extra mile time dont stay classy wonderful sheraton hilton etc substantially cheaper
